job description:
Overview:

As Head of Data Science, you are a mathematician and engineer with experience building multifunctional data sciences teams delivering data and event pipelines, building data warehouses for internal metrics, and making massive amounts of data available in real time for a variety of analysis. You're used to managing priorities at an executive level, can generate and develop proprietary data products, and are well-versed in reporting critical metrics to to senior management.

Responsibilities:
  • Build a team capable of developing and maintaining all internal data science products and servicing the various stakeholders inside BitMEX
  • Provide mentoring and guidance to your team across various data science disciplines
  • Develop and serve real time analytics to Product, Marketing, Business Development, Management, Investment, Risk Management, and Engineering teams
  • Manage data science initiatives, priorities, and delivery
  • Help generate and produce new end user products based on original data science work
  • Serve as a thought leader both internally and externally for how advanced data science techniques can be applied to the field of retail trading products and analysis
Requirements:

  • 5+ years of professional experience, with a proven track record building teams
  • An advanced degree in mathematics or statistics, or equivalent experience
  • Experience with AWS services and operating in the cloud generally
  • Experience with Kafka, Kinesis, or NATS a plus
  • Experience moving large amounts of real time data, and making it available to internal analytics tools
  • Familiarity with current industry data pipeline and ETL techniques
  • Experience in finance not required, but a plus
